Domestic market support - Claim evidence

Description: Support of Video Production costs

We require evidence of your costs (invoices/payslips etc.) and matched evidence of your payment of these costs (Bank and/or bacs statements/Credit card statements etc.)

Upload all your evidence files in support of this claim.
  • Each individual file shouldn’t be larger than 10MB.
  • We’ll check each file for viruses and notify you of any problems.
  • Preferred file types : pdf, jpg, jpeg, gif, png, tiff.

Supporting files

See examples

Upload your evidence in the appropriate section..

Period - Aug-17 to Dec-17

Consultancy fees

Bank statements

Bank statements must show transaction dates, amounts and payees that match other evidence, such as invoices, salary payments or receipts.
Help

Any transactions not relevant to your claim can be redacted (obscured or scored through).

For a bank statement to be fully compliant as evidence of payment, it must:

  • Be a formal statement (either paper copy or online printout), not simply a transaction listing
  • Clearly show the bank name, address and logo
  • Clearly show the account holder's name and details
  • Clearly show relevant transaction dates, amounts and payees that correspond to other evidence, such as invoices, salary payments or receipts.

Example:

bank-01-nov17.pdf
£16920

Invoices

Awaiting descriptive text
Invoices and receipts
Help

(only where applicable - service specific)

For a bank statement to be fully compliant as evidence of payment, it must:

  • Be stamped 'paid' or 'received with thanks', with the supplier's company stamp.
  • Be signed by an authorised accountable officer, such as a company secretary, director, partner or authorised signatory.
  • Include the invoice number, payment value, payment date and method of payment.

Example:

inv-01-nov17.pdf
£3330
Remove
inv-02-nov17.pdf
£11106
